attributes.action: make the private independent inquiry into the Iraq war public and the give the public the transparancy it needs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time the country understands all the events that lead up to the war in Iraq. And that the country also has full transparent access to all information about this most hated war. Protests before and during did not stop this war and it is time the public get the answers it deserves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
